message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000. Considering its quality and the importance it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $9500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your experience or project. I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
